document.full_text: baidu inc, china's top search engine, has been found guilty of copyright infringement and ordered to pay compensation to a popular literary website, the shanghai daily reported on thursday.
document.title: china's baidu fined for copyright infringement: report
lines_and_colors: baidu inc, china's top search engine, has been found guilty of copyright infringement and ordered to pay compensation to a popular literary website, the shanghai daily reported on thursday.
